JOB DESCRIPTION: Accountable to work independently with minimum assistance from other senior resources.    Ready to work in flexible time zone as per client requirement.    Accountable to understand the business requirement from BA and transform them from non-technical requirement to technical requirement.    Accountable to break down program specification into its simplest elements and translating this logic into a programming language.    Require to prepare effort estimation using proper calculation mechanism own experience with minimum deviation.    Always be proactive to suggest implement best practice in all projects as per available scopes.    There should not be any miss in project delivery timeline once its communicated to client.    As a senior developer always need to be responsible for project timelines.    Accountable to communicate with other teams like IT Server team, Network team etc.    Accountable to perform end to end all necessary setup (software middleware) independently on development, testing production environment.
